messages.subject: Re: Adelaide Australia
messages.msgSnippet: I have a friend who lived in Adelaide for two or three years with young children.  She doesn t homeschool though (and doesn t think it is a prarticularly good
messages.messageBody:
I have a friend who lived in Adelaide for two or three years with
young children. She doesn't homeschool though (and doesn't think it
is a prarticularly good idea). I don't know what kind of info you are
looking for but if you think she could help I can forward your e-mail
address to her.

Mary


--- In UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com, DACunefare@a... wrote:
> Is there anyone on this list from Adelaide, and if so could you
contact me
> offlist? I'm in need of the kind of information only a local parent
can provide!
> :)
>
> Deborah in IL

messages.subject: Adelaide Australia

messages.messageBody:
Is there anyone on this list from Adelaide, and if so could you contact me
offlist? I'm in need of the kind of information only a local parent can provide!
:)

Deborah in IL
